rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment contains factual statements about food safety and surveillance.
The segment states factual information ('will not enter the food system') and discusses actions ('working... to actively look').
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment contains a bare negation ('will not enter') and a superlative boast not linked to public safety.
Segment does not contain a minimiser used in conjunction with a scale contrast.
